option.value: [nd_login bg_color='#4a515b' float='right' href='#'][nd_icon_text icon='' margin='16px 20px 16px 10px' text-color='#fff' text='Add Your Review' image='' link='#' float='right'][nd_alert image='http://www.nicdarkthemes.com/themes/travel/wp/demo/travel/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/04/icon-message-white.png' id='nd_options_alert_1' number='3' dropdown-bg-color='#434a54' number-bg-color='#1bbc9b' margin='15px 10px' float='right'][nd_alert_message title-color='#fff' description-color='#fff' href='#' image='http://www.nicdarkthemes.com/themes/travel/wp/demo/travel/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/03/package-newdelhi-150x150.jpg' title='Best Travel Plugin' description='CHECK FEATURES'][nd_alert_message description-color='#fff' title-color='#fff' href='#' image='http://www.nicdarkthemes.com/themes/travel/wp/demo/travel/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/03/package-london-150x150.jpg' title='Multi Purpose' description='A LOT OF DEMOS'][nd_alert_message description-color='#fff' title-color='#fff' href='#' image='http://www.nicdarkthemes.com/themes/travel/wp/demo/travel/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/03/package-rome-150x150.jpg' title='No Code Required' description='VERY EASY TO USE'][/nd_alert][nd_icon_text icon='' margin='16px 10px' text-color='#fff' text='My Bookings' image='' link='#' float='right']
